episodes.title: My Mother, the Satanic Killer - Cult Leader's Daughter, Kelly Higgins Speaks Out
episodes.description: Born into a Satanic Killing cult of secrecy, control, and fear, the daughter of Bernadette McNeilly breaks her silence for the very first time. Raised inside what she describes as a satanic cult, she recounts a childhood shaped by manipulation, ritualistic belief systems, and extreme violence. At the centre of it all was her mother, Bernadette McNeilly, and a close-knit group whose actions led to the brutal killing of an innocent 16-year-old.In this gripping episode, she speaks openly about the crimes, the psychological conditioning, and the lifelong impact of growing up surrounded by death and devotion to darkness. This is not just a story about murder, it’s about survival, truth, and the courage it takes to confront a past many would rather keep buried. Listener discretion is advised. You can contact James on his social media platforms. ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ http://instagram.com/jamesenglish2https://x.com/jamesenglish0 https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61577060205838 https://www.tiktok.com/@jamesenglishpodcast?_t=ZN-8z0ZI6MBb9C&_r=1 https://open.spotify.com/show/4PIErllOO06wFHyX4LkGLH?si=c36a8b3f513d4316 https://itunes.apple.com
